examples.korean: The party has been penetrated by extremists. 발음듣기 그 정당에는 과격론자들이 침투해 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The party has been penetrated by extremists. 발음

examples.korean: Police ejected a number of violent protesters from the hall. 발음듣기 경찰이 그 홀에서 많은 과격한 시위자들을 쫓아냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Police ejected a number of violent protesters from the hall. 발음

examples.korean: a radical solution to the problem 발음듣기 그 문제에 대한 과격한 해결법 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a radical solution to the problem 발음

examples.korean: He purged extremists from the party. 발음듣기 그는 그 당에서 과격파들을 제거했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He purged extremists from the party. 발음

examples.korean: Recent events have radicalized opinion on educational matters. 발음듣기 최근의 사건들이 교육 문제들에 대한 여론을 과격하게 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
